video.title: Marvel's Daredevil
video.synopsis: Blinded as a young boy, Matt Murdock fights injustice by day as a lawyer and by night as the Super Hero Daredevil in Hell's Kitchen, New York City.

episodes.synopsis: Murdock's vigilante crime fighting and his new law practice find equally dangerous challenges in a murder case tied to a corporate crime syndicate.
episodes.title: Into the Ring

episodes.synopsis: Murdock makes a near fatal error while trying to save a kidnapped boy, and finds an unlikely ally when he needs saving himself.
episodes.title: Cut Man

episodes.synopsis: Murdock and Foggy take on a mysterious wealthy client, but Murdock is convinced that there's more to the case than just the facts.
episodes.title: Rabbit in a Snowstorm

episodes.synopsis: Two vicious Russian brothers working for Fisk strike back against Daredevil. Fisk moves to further consolidate his power in the criminal underworld.
episodes.title: In the Blood

episodes.synopsis: Fisk moves forward with plans that threaten to rip Hell's Kitchen apart. Murdock and Foggy take on a case helping tenants victimized by a slumlord.
episodes.title: World on Fire

episodes.synopsis: Daredevil finds himself trapped in the fallout of Fisk's plan to take control of Hell's Kitchen. Ben Urich digs closer to the truth.
episodes.title: Condemned

episodes.synopsis: An important figure from Murdock's past reemerges seeking his help to battle a new enemy threatening Hell's Kitchen.
episodes.title: Stick

episodes.synopsis: While Murdock, Foggy and Karen's mission becomes clearer, Fisk's world spins further out of control in his battle for Hell's Kitchen.
episodes.title: Shadows in the Glass

episodes.synopsis: When Fisk gains the upper hand, the goal to destroy him becomes even more difficult, while Daredevil faces his own demons.
episodes.title: Speak of the Devil

episodes.synopsis: Murdock and Foggy's relationship is put to the ultimate test while a new enemy against Fisk emerges.
episodes.title: Nelson v. Murdock

episodes.synopsis: Fisk and Murdock wrestle with the consequences of their chosen paths, while Ben and Karen get closer to Fisk's true past.
episodes.title: The Path of the Righteous

episodes.synopsis: Fisk seeks revenge while Karen is haunted by recent events. Daredevil makes a startling discovery about Fisk's financing.
episodes.title: The Ones We Leave Behind

episodes.synopsis: In the season finale, a boxed-in Fisk and a desperate Murdock, Foggy and Karen are forced to play their end games.
episodes.title: Daredevil

episodes.synopsis: In the void left by Fisk's removal, a new threat to Hell's Kitchen emerges. Murdock and Foggy take on a client with a questionable past.
episodes.title: Bang

episodes.synopsis: As Murdock recovers from an attack, Foggy and Karen fight to protect their new client from both the law and the Kitchen's newest vigilante.
episodes.title: Dogs to a Gunfight

episodes.synopsis: Trapped face-to-face with the Punisher, Daredevil wrestles with the morality of vigilante justice. Meanwhile, Foggy and Karen work to save the firm.
episodes.title: New York's Finest

episodes.synopsis: Karen uncovers shocking facts about the Punisher, who finds himself hunted by a powerful force in Hell's Kitchen. Daredevil ponders his next moves.
episodes.title: Penny and Dime

episodes.synopsis: A former lover arrives in Hell's Kitchen and turns Murdock's world upside down. Karen digs for the truth about the Punisher.
episodes.title: Kinbaku

episodes.synopsis: A lethal foe returns with a vengeance, Foggy and Murdock risk the firm to ensure justice, and Karen sees a different side of the Punisher.
episodes.title: Regrets Only

episodes.synopsis: Murdock and Foggy take on the DA in the trial of the century, but their client refuses to play along. Murdock struggles to balance his dual identities.
episodes.title: Semper Fidelis

episodes.synopsis: As the firm's trial spins out of control, a figure from Murdock's past returns to deliver shocking revelations about the future of Hell's Kitchen.
episodes.title: Guilty as Sin

episodes.synopsis: Castle gets an offer he can't refuse. Foggy and Murdock question the future of their firm, but Karen won't give up so easily.
episodes.title: Seven Minutes in Heaven

episodes.synopsis: Murdock and Foggy get caught in the crossfire of the Punisher's revenge. Karen and Murdock dig for the truth in very different ways.
episodes.title: The Man in the Box

episodes.synopsis: The Punisher's war continues, and so does the body count in Hell's Kitchen. Murdock tries to finish what the DA started.
Daredevil goes underground to save an old friend. Karen follows a dangerous lead. The law firm of Nelson & Murdock may have reached its final chapter.
episodes.title: The Dark at the End of the Tunnel

episodes.synopsis: In the season finale, Daredevil is backed into the ultimate showdown for his own life -- and the future of Hell's Kitchen.
episodes.title: A Cold Day in Hell's Kitchen

episodes.synopsis: Shattered physically and spiritually, Matt rethinks his purpose and place in Hell's Kitchen. Meanwhile, Fisk puts a plan in motion from behind bars.
episodes.title: Resurrection

episodes.synopsis: Grieving for the life he's abandoned, Matt suffers a crisis of faith. Fisk makes a deal with the FBI that turns him into a target.
episodes.title: Please

episodes.synopsis: As Fisk moves into swanky new digs amid a public outcry, Matt wrestles with how far he's ready to go to right this wrong. Dex's aim comes into focus.
episodes.title: No Good Deed

episodes.synopsis: While Matt infiltrates a prison to find information on the Albanians, Fisk puts Dex in his crosshairs and a fed-up Foggy goes on the offensive.
episodes.title: Blindsided

episodes.synopsis: To quell the rising backlash over his release, Fisk serves up a scapegoat to the FBI. Dex misses the mark when he runs into a woman from his past.
episodes.title: The Perfect Game

episodes.synopsis: Driven to the edge, Dex loses his way until he's offered a lifeline by Fisk. Matt comes to Karen for help, which she agrees to give -- on one condition.
episodes.title: The Devil You Know

episodes.synopsis: The press crucifies Daredevil after the attack on the Bulletin, and Agent Nadeem suspects the FBI paid too high a price for Fisk's cooperation.
episodes.title: Aftermath

episodes.synopsis: A desperate Dex reaches out for help, Matt forms an uneasy alliance with Agent Nadeem, and Karen concocts a dangerous plan to provoke Fisk.
episodes.title: Upstairs/Downstairs

episodes.synopsis: Matt's already shaky world tilts when he learns a shocking truth. Karen runs for her life. Nadeem discovers how deep Fisk's influence runs.
episodes.title: Revelations

episodes.synopsis: Hunted by Fisk and haunted by mistakes from her past, Karen seeks refuge at the church. Matt finally gets his shot, and Dex goes in for the kill.
episodes.title: Karen

episodes.synopsis: Dex tries to run his prey to ground, Nadeem's conscience kicks in, and Fisk looks to recover a gift from Vanessa seized during his incarceration.
episodes.title: Reunion

episodes.synopsis: Fisks long-awaited reunion doesn't go as planned. Nelson & Murdock take on a new client who holds key information on Kingpin.
episodes.title: One Last Shot

episodes.synopsis: In the season finale, Matt prepares to cross the line, as Dex becomes more dangerous than ever and Fisk enacts his endgame.
episodes.title: A New Napkin
